title: New: SALES – Getting It On
body:
Photo: [Harryson T Photography](https://www.

facebook.com/pages/Harryson-T-Photography/229867633819735) This new EP from Florida’s SALES is all killer, no filler. Featuring four previously heard tracks, alongside an XXYYXX remix, and new cut, Getting It On, there’s now no denying that they’re one of the most exciting new acts around right now. Perfect summer make-out music, buy this EP for your crush, and there’s no way they won’t fall head over heels for you. Check out Getting It On below, alongside the full EP, oh and purchase it [here](http://www.sales.bandcamp.com/album/sales-ep).
